scripts.preversion: yarn lint && yarn test && yarn build
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && yarn publish --new-version $npm_package_version && git push && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
scripts.build:examples:react: cd examples/reactjs && yarn && yarn build && cd ../../
scripts.build:examples:vue: cd examples/vuejs && yarn && yarn build && cd ../../
scripts.deploy:examples:react: mkdir -p docs/examples/react && rm -rf docs/examples/react/* && mv examples/reactjs/build/* docs/examples/react
scripts.deploy:examples:vue: mkdir -p docs/examples/vue && rm -rf docs/examples/vue/* && mv examples/vuejs/dist/* docs/examples/vue
scripts.deploy:examples: yarn build:examples && yarn deploy:examples:react && yarn deploy:examples:vue && yarn deploy:examples:vanilla
